Articles.Content:
I really like watching rocket launches, and one of my favorite parts is seeing the exhaust from the engine explode out of the pad right before they release the rocket. In ksp I hold the rocket to try and get a similar effect but it's not very satisfying since the smoke is rendered as 2d and goes through everything. Does anybody else feel a desire for this? If so please comment on this. And if anyone knows of a mod I would appreciate it. Thanks!
